statements: SELECT * FROM credit_card_rewards_points;
SELECT user_id, total_points FROM credit_card_rewards_points;
SELECT user_id, points_expiry_date FROM credit_card_rewards_points ORDER BY points_expiry_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_rewards_points WHERE total_points > 1000;
SELECT user_id, points_usage_description FROM credit_card_rewards_points WHERE total_points < 500;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_rewards_points WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, total_points FROM credit_card_rewards_points WHERE total_points > 1000;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_rewards_points WHERE points_expiry_date > NOW();
SELECT user_id, points_usage_description FROM credit_card_rewards_points WHERE total_points < 500 OR points_expiry_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM credit_card_rewards_points ORDER BY points_expiry_date DESC, total_points ASC;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_rewards;
SELECT credit_card_number, rewards_points FROM credit_card_rewards WHERE rewards_points > 1000;
SELECT * FROM rewards_optimization ORDER BY optimal_strategy ASC;
SELECT credit_card_id, optimal_strategy FROM rewards_optimization WHERE credit_card_id = 1;
SELECT id, rewards_points, credit_card_number FROM credit_card_rewards ORDER BY rewards_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_rewards WHERE rewards_points > 100 ORDER BY credit_card_number ASC;
SELECT credit_card_number, SUM(rewards_points) AS total_points FROM credit_card_rewards GROUP BY credit_card_number HAVING total_points > 500;
SELECT credit_card_number, optimal_strategy FROM credit_card_rewards JOIN rewards_optimization ON credit_card_rewards.id = rewards_optimization.credit_card_id;
SELECT AVG(rewards_points) AS average_points FROM credit_card_rewards;
SELECT credit_card_number, SUM(rewards_points) AS total_points FROM credit_card_rewards GROUP BY credit_card_number HAVING total_points > 1000 ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM CreditCardRewardsPoints;
SELECT card_number, points_balance FROM CreditCardRewardsPoints;
SELECT * FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT card_number, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount_spent FROM Transactions GROUP BY card_number;
SELECT card_number, SUM(redeemed_points) AS total_points_redeemed FROM RewardsRedemption GROUP BY card_number;
SELECT * FROM CreditCardRewardsPoints WHERE points_balance > 1000 ORDER BY card_number DESC;
SELECT card_number, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM Transactions GROUP BY card_number HAVING total_spent > 5000;
SELECT card_number, points_balance FROM CreditCardRewardsPoints WHERE rewards_program = 'Gold' AND points_balance < 500 ORDER BY points_balance ASC;

SELECT r.card_number, r.redeemed_points, rr.redemption_date FROM RewardsRedemption rr JOIN CreditCardRewardsPoints r ON rr.card_number = r.card_number WHERE rr.redemption_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY rr.redemption_date;
SELECT MAX(points_balance) AS max_points, MIN(points_balance) AS min_points FROM CreditCardRewardsPoints;
SELECT * FROM Rewards_Programs;
SELECT program_id, program_name, credit_card FROM Rewards_Programs WHERE reward_rate > 0.5;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM Users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, program_id, points_balance FROM Points_Balance WHERE points_balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM Rewards_Programs ORDER BY program_name ASC, reward_rate DESC;
SELECT SUM(points_balance) AS total_points FROM Points_Balance WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_name, program_name, points_balance FROM Users JOIN Points_Balance ON Users.user_id = Points_Balance.user_id ORDER BY points_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND program_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT program_id, program_name, SUM(reward_rate) AS total_reward_rate FROM Rewards_Programs GROUP BY program_id, program_name HAVING SUM(reward_rate) > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM rewards_program;
SELECT program_id, program_name FROM rewards_program ORDER BY program_id DESC;
SELECT card_id, issuer, reward_category FROM credit_cards WHERE annual_fee < 100;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM cardholders WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT transaction_id, merchant, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM rewards_program WHERE point_value > 0.50 ORDER BY program_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT card_name, issuer, reward_category FROM credit_cards WHERE annual_fee < 100.00 ORDER BY issuer DESC, card_name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM cardholders WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY full_name COLLATE NOCASE ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, card_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100.00 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM rewards_earned WHERE earned_points >= 1000 ORDER BY cardholder_id, transaction_id DESC LIMIT 5;
